node.title: Bruce Willis "stepping away" from career due to aphasia diagnosis, family says
node.description: Aphasia is a language disorder that impacts a person's ability to communicate.
node.content: ["Acclaimed actor Bruce Willis is \"stepping away\" from his career due to a recent diagnosis of aphasia, a language disorder that impacts a person's ability to communicate, his family said Wednesday.\u00a0", "\"To Bruce's amazing supporters, as a family we wanted to share that our beloved Bruce has been experiencing some health issues and has recently been diagnosed with aphasia, which is impacting his cognitive abilities,\" his family wrote in a post on his daughter Rumer's Instagram account. \"As a result of this and with much consideration Bruce is stepping away from the career that has meant so much to him.\"\u00a0", "A post shared by Rumer Willis (@rumerwillis)", "\"This is a really challenging time for our family and we are so appreciative of your continued love, compassion and support,\" his family added. \"We are moving through this as a strong family unit, and wanted to bring his fans in because we know how much he means to you, as you do to him.\"\u00a0", "This is a developing story. It will be updated.\u00a0", "Victoria Albert is a Sr. News Editor at CBS News. Reach her at victoria.albert@viacomcbs.com"]
